LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Title: Advanced Melee
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.DifferingReset: These {PawnCount} pawns have differing auto-execute settings. Click to set them all to '{Mode}'.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.ExplainResolved: This means that this pawn will automatically execute enemies whenever they can.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.ExplainResolvedPlural: This means that these {PawnCount} pawns will automatically execute enemies whenever they can.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.Explain: This means that this pawn will NOT automatically execute enemies.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.ExplainPlural: This means that these {PawnCount} pawns will NOT automatically execute enemies.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.Mode.Default: This pawn is using the Default auto-execute setting, which is {Mode}.\n\n{Explanation}
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.Mode.DefaultPlural: These {PawnCount} pawns are using the Default auto-execute setting, which is {Mode}.\n\n{Explanation}
